issue.title: [Developer][Documentation] Organize source and binary dependency licenses into directories
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5954](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5954). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Similarly like Spark does, see comment https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4880/files/b839964a2a43123991b5b291607ff1cb026fe8a4#diff-61e0bdf7e1b43c5c93d9488b22e04170
